Package dynamicAnalysis

Class ReadWrite

java.lang.Object
dynamicAnalysis.ReadWrite
public class ReadWrite
extends java.lang.Object
Helper class for reading and writing to a text file.

    • indexOf

      public static int indexOf​(java.lang.String word, java.lang.String file)
      First index that the specified string is found at. Returns -1 if it is not found.
      Parameters:
      word - the string to be searched in the text file
      file - the text file to be searched
      Returns:
      the index that the string is located in the text file, -1 if it is not found

      Replace the first occurence of a line with another.
      Parameters:
      oldWord - the line to be replaces
      newWord - the new line to replace the first occurence of oldWord
      file - the text file

    • replace

      public static void replace​(int index, java.lang.String newWord, java.lang.String file)
      Replace the line at the specified index with a new line.
      Parameters:
      index - the index to be replaces
      newWord - the new word to replace at the index
      file - the text file
